page.title: 16Tourism Trade Holiday Inn
page.content: The Holday Inn-Seaton Burn. There are 17 of these hotels in Britain. People who stay in them are business men mostly but only 10% of them are foreign.There are 150 rooms and every room has its own bathroom with shower,colour TV,airconditioning and multi-channel radio,trouser presser,hairdryer and direct telephone line. The leisure facilities at the Holiday Inn at Seaton Burn are all indoor and include a swimming pool, sauna,sunbed,gymroom and a games room.The swimmimg pool and gym are open to non residents,but are expensive when compared with other pools in the area. Altogether there are 150 people working full time and there are many more part-timers.The restuarant seats 120 people and a lot of local people use this facility. Rooms can be hired for banquets.
